Activity: Check emails for a response from the EHR vendor. If a meeting is scheduled, prepare an agenda and send it to all participants. Review feedback from @QATEST-1.
Address feedback from @QATEST-1, make adjustments to the data dictionary and implementation plan.
Work on researching data migration strategies, focusing on minimal disruption of existing systems and efficient data transfer.
Document potential data migration strategies in the implementation plan, highlighting the advantages and disadvantages of each option.
Consult with @DBA-1 regarding the data migration strategies. Seek input on the feasibility and optimal approach for migrating data from the old system to the new system.
Lunch Break. Read a book about new EHR technology.
Finalize the data migration strategy in the implementation plan, incorporating feedback from @DBA-1. Specify the tools and techniques to be used for data migration.

Develop a test plan outlining the key test cases to be performed to ensure the updated EHR system is functioning correctly. Include test cases for data collection, data integration, and data analysis.
Review the test plan with @QATEST-1 and @RN-1 to ensure the test cases are comprehensive and relevant to the project's goals.
Refine the test plan based on the review with @QATEST-1 and @RN-1. Document any changes made.
Prepare a summary of the day's progress, including the finalization of the data migration strategy and the development of the test plan. Send to @ITPM-1.
Wrap up the day by organizing notes and documents related to the project. Prepare for tomorrow's tasks.
